channel.title: Quality feed back
channel.description:
I'm just testing out some new recoding tools that can handle high FPS and HD along with sound. Was wondering if I can get feed back from you guys on if the quality of the sound is ok and the video quality. Right now the max I have is 1080P
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d3_Awetv3LU
Thx everyone.

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I don’t see why you’d need customer support since you can find help or guides for anything online. Programs like this are way overpriced in my opinion anyway.

I’ve had a cracked version of Sony Vegas for awhile as well and haven’t had any problems with it, so I don’t know about that.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

ytuio9`:

What’s the song name?

Teenagers by My chemical romance.

[quote=“Rich, post:12, topic:416675”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=518565.msg3768790#msg3768790 date=1317495576]
When I’m going to be using something often I like to have a warranty with it so I know that if it’s down I can call them and they will work to get it back up. It’s to much of a hassle with cracked stuff.
[/quote]
…What?

As for the video, quality is great but fix the aspect ratio.[/quote]
Thx for the feedback, and what I meant by that was, if I’m going to be using a video editing tool I want to be sure I can call customer support since I’ll be relying on that tool to get the job done, with cracked versions you can’t really have them send you a new copy if your has an updating problem and crashed

Read full topic

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

When I’m going to be using something often I like to have a warranty with it so I know that if it’s down I can call them and they will work to get it back up. It’s to much of a hassle with cracked stuff.

…What?

As for the video, quality is great but fix the aspect ratio.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:9, topic:416675”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=518565.msg3768779#msg3768779 date=1317494744]
Thx for the responses everyone, had to make sure it was the same for everyone, using trial version of Sony Vegas pro. Testing it all out before I buy it, and believe it or not that was recorded with hyper-cam free. They removed the silly trail version thing flashing.
[/quote]
Why would you buy it? You can get the cracked version.[/quote]
When I’m going to be using something often I like to have a warranty with it so I know that if it’s down I can call them and they will work to get it back up. It’s to much of a hassle with cracked stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Thx for the responses everyone, had to make sure it was the same for everyone, using trial version of Sony Vegas pro. Testing it all out before I buy it, and believe it or not that was recorded with hyper-cam free. They removed the silly trail version thing flashing.

Why would you buy it? You can get the cracked version.

Read full topic

item.title: Quality feed back
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Thx for the responses everyone, had to make sure it was the same for everyone, using trial version of Sony Vegas pro. Testing it all out before I buy it, and believe it or not that was recorded with hyper-cam free. They removed the silly trail version thing flashing.

item.description:

So what are you using to make the video?
